code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{ShopContext}from'../../../../context/ShopContext';import Sort from'./components/Sort/Sort';import Product from'./components/Product/Product';import Pagination from'./components/Pagination/Pagination';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const{productsInfo}=useContext(ShopContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"products-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sort-and-count",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-count",children:["There are ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{id:"products-count",className:"bold",children:productsInfo.totalFilteredProducts})," products in this category"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sort,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products js-products",children:productsInfo.filteredProducts.length>0?productsInfo.filteredProducts.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Product,{product:product},product.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No products found"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{})]});};export default ProductList;
